IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Companies]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Companies]
GO

CREATE TABLE Companies(
    Company_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    Company NVARCHAR(255),
    Contact NVARCHAR(255),
    Region NVARCHAR(255),
);

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Postal_Code]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Postal_Code]
GO

CREATE TABLE Postal_Code(
    Postal_Code INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    State NVARCHAR(255),
    Region NVARCHAR(255),
    Country_Region NVARCHAR(255),
    Country NVARCHAR(255)
);

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Product_Types]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Product_Types]
GO

CREATE TABLE Product_Types(
    Product_Type NVARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
    Product_Category NVARCHAR(255)
);

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Products]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[Products]
GO

CREATE TABLE Products(
    Product_ID NVARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
    Product_Name NVARCHAR(255),
    Category NVARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (Category) REFERENCES Product_Types(Product_Type)
);

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[MERGED_DATA]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[MERGED_DATA]
GO

CREATE TABLE MERGED_DATA(
    Order_ID NVARCHAR(255),
    Order_Date DATE,
    Ship_Date DATE,
    Ship_Mode NVARCHAR(255),
    Customer_ID NVARCHAR(255),
    Segment NVARCHAR(255),
    Postal_Code INTEGER,
    Product_ID NVARCHAR(255),
    SALES decimal(20,2),
    QUANTITY INTEGER,
    Discount FLOAT,
    Profit FLOAT,
    Create_Timestamp DATETIME,
    SOURCE_FILE NVARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (Postal_Code) REFERENCES Postal_Code(Postal_Code),
    FOREIGN KEY (Product_ID) REFERENCES Products(Product_ID)
);

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[MERGED_DATA_LOGS]') AND type in (N'U'))
DROP TABLE [dbo].[MERGED_DATA_LOGS]
GO

CREATE TABLE MERGED_DATA_LOGS(
    SOURCE_FILE NVARCHAR(255),
    TIMESTAMP DATETIME,
    SOURCE_ROW_COUNT INTEGER,
    ERROR_ROWS INTEGER,
    DUPLICATE_ROW_COUNT INTEGER,
    FINAL_COUNT INTEGER
);
